Recommended Treatment: Adjuvant vaginal brachytherapy per NCCN guidelines for stage I endometrial adenocarcinoma (grade 2, >50% myometrial invasion).
Description: Surgical pathology reveals a grade 2 endometrioid adenocarcinoma of the uterus with deep (75–80%) myometrial invasion and no lymph node metastases, staged as pT1c pN0 (FIGO IC).
Patient Notes: Your pathology report shows endometrial cancer that was confined to the uterus and has not spread to lymph nodes. The tumor was grade 2 and invaded more than half of the uterine muscle wall. You have had a hysterectomy with removal of both ovaries and tubes. Based on current NCCN guidelines, we recommend adjuvant vaginal brachytherapy to reduce the risk of local recurrence.

verification.assessment: The extraction accurately captures the key diagnostic, staging, and treatment recommendation fields. For completeness, lymphovascular invasion status could be added, but no critical errors were identified.
